i1.name: Center of the Universe
i1.cooldown: {{tt|2|The time within which the same star cannot damage the same target twice.}}
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' is constantly orbited by three ''Stars'', each doing a full circumference in {{fd|5.25}} seconds, and beyond them exists an {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} affecting his damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]].

The ''Stars'' deal {{as|{{pp|10+2*x for 5; then + 3*x for 2; then + 6*x for 4; then + 10*x|formula=10 + 2 per level until lvl 5, then + 3 until lvl 7, then + 6 per level until lvl 11, then + 10 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{passive progression/deprecated version|type = [[File:Celestial Expansion.png|20px|border|link=]] Celestial Expansion's Rank|5|5 to 25}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies that come in contact with them as well as execute enemy {{tip|minions}} that have less than {{sti|health|{{as|25 health}}}}, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
i1.notes:
* The ''Stars'' orbit counterclockwise around '''Aurelion Sol'''.
* '''Aurelion Sol's''' ''Stars'' have independent {{tip|sight|vision}} hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a {{tip|brush}}, and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden.
** In addition to not being considered to be {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} for interception purposes, it is possible that his ''Stars'' are considered [[champion summoned units]].
* An individual ''Star'' must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again. 
* In the event that an enemy orbits around '''Aurelion Sol''' at the same rate as his ''Stars'' without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.

r1.name: Voice of Light
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' exhales a wave of star fire in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.125}} seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} to it.
'''''Aurelion Sol''' {{tip|channel|channels}} over {{fd|0.3}} seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.''
''{{ai|W|Aurelion Sol}} can be cast during Voice of Light''.
